title: Weems & Plath Weather Station
features: Three brass instruments mounted on a solid mahogany plaque.

Quartz clock, barometer & comfortmeter (indicating temperature & relative humidity). Vertical configuration can be reconfigured horizontally Made in Germany AA battery, instructions & mounting hardware included Lifetime warranty
Made in Germany. AA battery, instructions & mounting hardware included
Dimensions: Dial: 2 1/2" (64 mm) Width: 4 1/4" (108 mm) Ht: 12 1/2" (108 mm) Weight: 1 lb (454 g)
description: The traditional marine Weather Station is perfect for any boater or outdoorsman who wants to monitor the weather at a glance. This functional yet attractive set gives the user three essential elements in the weather equation: air pressure, air temperature and relative humidity. Three traditional marine instruments are mounted on a beautiful solid mahogany plaque. The easy to read instruments are a quartz clock, a barometer, and a comfortmeter (combination thermometer/hygrometer). The plaque measures 12 inches x4 1/4 inches and can be mounted vertically on a wall in the home, office or on the bulkhead of a boat.
